content:
EventFieldFormat Enum

Definition

Specifies how to format the value of a user-defined type and can be used to override the default formatting for a field.

In this Article

public enum EventFieldFormat
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
EventFieldFormat

Fields

Boolean

Default.

Hexadecimal.
